trends: There have been 404 other sightings in Los Angeles
There were no other sightings in Los Angeles on or around May 27th 2010
divs: sighting detailsi live in the hollywood hills on a desolate cul de sac high in the mountains at an elevation of about 1100 feet above sea level. last night behind my house and directly above my backyard which is on a heavily wooded canyon - there was a series of very mysterious white lights (olbong and oval shaped) that appeared across the canyon at the skyline (at cloud level) atop of the opposite canyon ridge. i was looking out the window at the sky around midnight, getting ready for bed. i noticed that it was unusually very bright outside because it was nearly a full moon last night. it was otherwise very quiet and still. at first a single white orb appeared and looked like it was "skipping" across the sky very rapidly then it would move to the center of a roughly circular pattern it was traveling and then other white "orbs" would appear. the white orbs (roughly 6-8 total) would almost touch in the center and then spread out in a wheel like\spoke pattern almost like a ballet. it reminded me of an air show with fighter jets where the jets travel in formation and then they form a pattern in the center and then shoot off from a center formation. this light show continued for the better part of an hour until well past 1 a.m. the "firing"\appearance of the white orbs would be random. first one would appear, then travel in roughly a circular pattern skipping through the clouds - it moved rapidly towards the center of the circular path and then other orbs would appear and then shoot out from the center. there was no noise\sound associated with these lights. i was not frightened by these lights - they appeared to be "playing" tag or skipping around very playfully. they were moving very rapidly. i was trying to think of how these lights could possibly be explained - were they lasers? if so, where would the lasers come from? were they lightening balls? (it was not storming, although it was partly cloudy). it was not possible that these were lasers because the canyon itself below is not very heavily populated and all of the neighbors' lights were out - as if everyone was in bed as it was after midnight. overall, it was a very strange and mysterious occurrence. the lights stopped as abruptly as they started. did anyone else see these lights?!
Summary: Mysterious white orbs over Hollywood Hills/Caheunga pass canyon
